english: Sanitation Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Mushrooms
title: 食用菇類重金屬限量標準

articles.content: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
This Standard applies to the carpophores. Mycelium is not included.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals:
┌─────────┬────────────────────┐
│Heavy metal       │Maximumtolerance（dry weight basis）    │
├─────────┼────────────────────┤
│Lead              │Not more than 3 ppm                     │
├─────────┼────────────────────┤
│Cadmium           │Not more than 2 ppm                     │
└─────────┴────────────────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
